title: I Don't WANT To
text: I have found that in order to do the things I want to do, I must also do a lot of things I don't want to do. But knowing I will get to do the things I want to do, it makes it easier and more enjoyable to do the things I don't.

title: Chase Your Passions
text: Passions come in many shapes and sizes. It can be related to the work one does, or for whom they work to provide for. Passion can even be just for fun! Regardless of what your passion is, or the reasons you have such passion, embrace it today! Chase after your passions. It will make you much happier!

title: Believe in Yourself
text: Although it is nice to have others believe in youâ€¦you will become great if you believe in yourself.

title: Believe in Others
text: I find very few things in life that give me greater pleasure than seeing my friends and loved ones succeed.

title: Try Something New
text: I absolutely love trying new things and experiences. In 2021, I found doing my Zen gardening one of the best new experiences and I'm so glad I started! Now is a great time to try something new!
